title: Is "have no idea how to make a work schedule" a job requirement for management positions?
body:
She's got multiple people, including me, scheduled to close at night, then open the following morning. It's really, really bullshit, mang. Everyone is getting tired of it, and I mean literally tired. If she wants us at our best, let us get proper rest. Yes I know that rhymed. 

This is why I won't get into management, I'm too damn smart for it.
